data.name: Banana Joe
data.description:
### Banana Joe's Bananas!

# Story
The Banana world that Banana Joe lives in uses Bananas as their currency. 
Banana Joe wants to buy `n` products, and each of these products cost `banana_price`. That's the thing, Banana Joe only has `money` amount of money. 

# Requirements
For this task, you would have to determine how much money would Banana Joe have left after this purchase. If Banana Joe doesn't have enough money, simply print how much he has as debt. 

# Input

You would be able to access all the inputs automatically, as it is passed in as an argument in the function. 

# Output

There would be one line of output, the amount of bananas Banana Joe has left, or the amount of bananas Banana Joe owes.
